titleStmt.title: A declaration made by the right Honourable the Earle of Bath, one of his Majesties commissioners of array, to the whole country of Devonshire, with their answer thereunto annexed; also the manner how the said Earle of Bath endeavoured to put the commission of array in execution, at South-moulton in Devonshire, and how his men were driven out of the town by the inhabitants thereof. Whereunto is added, a true relation of the great battle betweene Prince Robert and the Parliaments forces at Worcester; with their happy victory over his cavaliers.
titleStmt.author: Bath, Henry Bourchier, Earl of, 1587 or 8-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Septemb. 29. London Printed for John Wright,

notesStmt.note: With two letters dated 14 and 15 Sept. 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
